feed.title: PlayableElectronics
feed.subtitle: Hey, my name is Daniel aka ReverbRick. This is a new home for PlayableElectronics (PE in short). I make all kind of electronic instruments and controllers for live performance.

entry.title: Say hi to Contour Synthesizer!
entry.content:
Open instrument using ease of arduino and power of ESP32 and natural wood as sound generation surface.

Check wiki for morehttps://github.com/reverbrick/contour/wiki
entry.summary: Open instrument using ease of arduino and power of ESP32 and natural wood as sound generation surface.
